attributes.action: Combat street violence and vandalism with a major change in practice and resourcing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Millions of people are increasingly affected by crime which threatens their families and property. Young thugs act with impunity. The seemingly unlimited resources, for example, in the rigorous policing of motorists must be switched to the arrest and punishment of those that make life miserable or fearful for so many decent people.
